Double vinyl LP pressing. Kavinsky is a zombie who came back from the dead after his Testarossa crashed in 1986. His first song, 'Testarossa Autodrive', was an instant success, and was followed by two singles. In 2011, his track 'Nightcall', produced with Guy-Manuel de Homem-Christo, became ...

Stumbled across Kavinsky on Youtube, never turned back since... People compare him to Daft Punk, but when I listen to Kavinsky, I hardly even hear Daft Punk in his music! Sure they worked together, but man, Kavinsky's his own species within the world of electronica (not to mention his badass icon).

Just an amazing ride from front to back. The vinyl pressing is pristine. No noise. Clean clean clean. The mix is superb, not some over compressed mess. Highly recommended. ... Elettronica allo stato puro, ottima qualità sonora e un Kavinsky che ritorna in grande stile, WOW!

s: The print quality is amazing, and the art direction shines a bright light on the magnificent music of Kavinsky. If you want to lose yourself in a nostalgic era you will never ever experience again -i.e. The 80s', and you have a thing for vinyl music, you'll definitely want to buy this one.
